Exercise

  • Walking

Walking

The easiest, safest and cheapest form of exercise. Keep your body and mind in shape. Every step takes you closer to a healthy lifestyle.

How much exercise do I need?

It is recommended for adults to get at least 150 minutes (21/2 hours) of moderate to vigorous activity per week. An easy goal to remember is thirty minutes a day five days a week.
